SEARCH
Package game.items.template

Interface Buyable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Astley, DragonSlayerSword, EnergyDrink, Theseus, ToiletPaperRoll
public interface Buyable
The Buyable interface serves as a way for objects to be purchased, if the objects are purchased they will deduct the credits from the buyer.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    buyItem(Actor actor)
    When called, if the player can afford to buy the item it will deduct from the player's wallet and add it to the inventory.

  • Method Details

    • buyItem

      String buyItem(Actor actor)
      When called, if the player can afford to buy the item it will deduct from the player's wallet and add it to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      actor - the Player
      Returns:
      a message for if the purchase is successful or not
